quote: It's like we are underground, in a cemetery....the sky is the earth...We are hibernating, sleeping all the time and we don't know it. We are dreaming that there is plenty of oxygen.
quote_letters: ITS LIKE WE ARE UNDERGROUND IN A CEMETERYTHE SKY IS THE EARTHWE ARE HIBERNATING SLEEPING ALL THE TIME AND WE DONT KNOW IT WE ARE DREAMING THAT THERE IS PLENTY OF OXYGEN
